name: web-ledger_server
description: This is the server for web-ledger.

scripts.start: npm run start:database && npm run start:server
scripts.dev: npm run start:database && npm run dev:server
scripts.start:database: for /F "tokens=3 delims=: " %H in ('sc query MySQL8.0.31Dev ^| findstr "        STATE"') do (    if /I "%H" NEQ "RUNNING" (      net start MySQL8.0.31Dev     )  )
scripts.check:database: powershell.exe -Command "Get-Service MySQL8.0.31Dev | Format-List -Property Name, DisplayName, Status, StartType"

author: Bradley Biera
